title: Is it proper to be served with Form Interrogatories and Request for Production of Documents in a paternity case?
question: I filed a petition to establish parental relationship on my ex girlfriend. She served me with Form Interrogatories, Schedule of Assetts and Debts and Request for Production of Documents. Is this proper? I thought these discovery devices were for divorce proceedings?
question_tags: Divorce,Dividing debts in a divorce,Child support,Divorce and bankruptcy,Child custody,Bankruptcy,Debt,Bankruptcy and debt,Child support and custody,Paternity and child custody,Lawsuits and disputes,Discovery,Paternity
